dict.acceptation: 家庭，户；（集合词）全家人，（包含人在内的）家眷，家属，家里人；家庭；（英）王室；
家庭的，家内的，一家的；日常的，家常的，普通的；家喻户晓的；王室的；

sent.orig: The acquisition failed because of bad debts at Household, but the original premise was wrong too.
sent.trans: 由于Household的坏账，这次收购失败了。但原来的前提其实也是错的。

sent.orig: Household registry, residence, household policies are the basic concepts involved with science of household policy.
sent.trans: 户籍、户口、户政三个概念，是涉及户政学的基础概念。

sent.orig: Relationships are properly preserved when merging a newly created household into an existing household.
sent.trans: 关系得到妥善保存合并时，新成立的家庭到现有的家庭。

sent.orig: Inevitably, huge household financial deficit also means huge accumulations of household debt.
sent.trans: 不可避免地，巨额家庭财务赤字也意味着巨额家庭财政负债。

sent.orig: We are the household, forever the household.
sent.trans: 最佳参考答案：我们是一家人，永远的一家人。
